snippet: Christine C. Quinn is the first candidate to raise all the money she is allowed to spend in the primary while accepting public financing.
abstract: Christine C Quinn becomes the first candidate to raise all the money a New York City mayoral candidate is allowed to spend in the primary while accepting public financing; Quinn's campaign has raised more than $4.9 million, and is expected to reach the maximum amount of $6,729,00 soon.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn is the first candidate to raise all the money she is allowed to spend in the primary while accepting public financing.

headline.seo: Christine Quinn Reaches Goal in Mayoral Primary Funds
headline.main: Quinn’s Coffers Reach Goal for Mayoral Primary
headline.print_headline: Quinn’s Coffers Reach Goal for Primary
